channel.title: 100 errors =*( dont know how to fix, nearly tried everything
channel.description:
so...i have 100 errors:
[code]100 errors Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
i went thru and tried to delete all messed up commands from tut's i did with the /* , */ , \* , *\ 's and things like that.
i just now started back server and its had errors since i quit running it.
i think (not sure) that it happened after a whip special attack tut or just a special attack tut.
plz help i really want to fix it so i can do updates!

item.title: 100 errors =*( dont know how to fix, nearly tried everything

item.title: 100 errors =*( dont know how to fix, nearly tried everything
item.dc:creator: @1234ideclareathumbwa 1234ideclareathumbwar
item.description:
@1234ideclareathumbwa wrote:

Some of your commands may be starting with ‘else if’.If your first command starts with ‘else if’,change it to ‘if’ and leave the others be.Might fix some errors

Read full topic
